__prompts__.cloud_provider: Enter the cloud provider (e.g., aws, gcp):
__prompts__.cloud_region: Enter the region (e.g., us-east-1, us-west-1, eu-west-1):
__prompts__.schema_registry_auto_info: Enter the schema registry auto info (e.g., kafka_api_key, kafka_api_secret):
__prompts__.schema_registry_auth_type: Enter the schema registry auth type (basic or ssl, basic is supported at this time.  ssl is not supported yet):
__prompts__.version: Enter the version of the pipeline (e.g., 0.0.1):
__prompts__.friendly_name: Enter the friendly name (e.g., My Pipeline):
__prompts__.flink_compute_pool_id: Enter the Flink compute pool id:
__prompts__.output_target: Enter the output target (e.g., kafka, clickhouse, flink):
__prompts__.output_key_serializer: Enter the output key serializer (e.g., string):
__prompts__.output_value_serializer: Enter the output value serializer (e.g., avro):
__prompts__.input_source: Enter the input source (e.g., websocket, kafka, custom):
__prompts__.input_key_serializer: Enter the input key serializer (e.g., string):
__prompts__.input_value_serializer: Enter the input value serializer (e.g., avro):
__prompts__.log_level: Enter the log level (e.g., DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL):
__prompts__.log_format: Enter the log format (e.g., json, text):
__prompts__.log_s3_bucket: Enter the log S3 bucket (e.g., my-bucket):
__prompts__.aws_access_key_id: Enter the AWS access key id (e.g., AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE):
__prompts__.aws_secret_access_key: Enter the AWS secret access key (e.g., wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY):
